item.title: About Me
item.description:
I’m P&D and Data Scientist.

Working with Neuro-linguistic programming (NLP) an Web Scraping. Implementing automated processes and creating market intelligence tools.

Student of statistics at Federal University of Parana, but I graduated in web design at 13 years old.

I have experience with databases (MySql, MongoDB and Amazon DynamoDB), Git to version control system, Aws Tools, and my favorite programming languages are Python, R and Php.
